history.proof: intros f g x Hf Hg. unfold ex_derive in *. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hg]. exists (minus lf lg). apply is_derive_minus; auto.

original: intros f g x Hf Hg. unfold ex_derive in *. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hg]. exists (minus lf lg). apply is_derive_minus; auto.
